TrEd Extension: padt (version 1.68)

Prague Arabic Dependency Treebank

(generated documentation)

Description:

Various annotation modes for Prague Arabic Dependency Treebank.

Installation

This extension can be installed directly from TrEd, using Setup >> Manage Extensions >> Get New Extensions; just make sure the repository http://ufal.mff.cuni.cz/tred/extensions/core/ is enabled in Setup >> Manage Extensions >> Edit Repositories.

TrEd macro files:

  • padt/contrib.mac
  • padt/Deeper.mak
  • padt/Morpho.mak
  • padt/Phrase.mak
  • padt/Syntax.mak
  • padt/Words.mak

Resource files:

  • deeper.schema.xml
  • morpho.schema.xml
  • syntax.schema.xml
  • words.schema.xml
